casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ricky Jackson HENNIS. No. 342P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 19, 2007. J. Clark Fischer, Winston-Salem, for Hennis. Belinda J. Foster, District Attorney, for State. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 646 S.E.2d 398 .

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th day of July 2007 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of July 2007."
